attributes.action: UK citizens vaccinated in France can return to UK without quarantine measures.
attributes.additional_details: France to be removed from Amber plus status and given parity as other EU countries and the US now have, with effect from 04:00 1/08/2021.
attributes.background: UK citizens fully COVID vaccinated in France are still excluded from returning to the UK to visit family and friends. This discriminates against our basic human rights. Many have now not seen family for over two years. This is is causing mental distress and contravening basic human rights.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same/a similar action: 

Allow ALL vaccinated British Expats to visit the UK without quarantining
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585438
